name: A Tail of Dreams
description: Woof woof! Play as an adventurous dog as they explore their wildest dreams throughout the day! Explore a mysterious, yet oddly familiar park in a search for your owner. Go old-school with a twist on a classic retro mini-game. Delve into a dog's perspective on war. This game was created by two individuals for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1! The game was created in less than a week and followed the theme "It is not real".  Let us know what you think. Special thanks to CorruptData for play testing and debugging.
